song.verse: She′s got a smile that it seems to me Reminds me of childhood memories Where everything Was as fresh as the bright blue sky Now and then when I see her face She takes me away to that special place And if I′d stare too long I′d probably break down and cry
song.chorus: Sweet child o′ mine Sweet love of mine
song.verse: She′s got eyes of the bluest skies As if they thought of rain I hate to look into those eyes And see an ounce of pain Her hair reminds me of a warm safe place Where as a child I′d hide And pray for the thunder And the rain To quietly pass me by
song.chorus: Sweet child o′ mine Sweet love of mine
song.verse: Where do we go Where do we go now Where do we go Sweet child o′ mine
